de.hft_stuttgart.spirit.android

Class Story

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hft_stuttgart.spirit.android.Story
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Story
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Author:
    Mirjam Class 'Story' saves the data of a downloaded Story. This includes the meta data and the paths of the downloaded XML and media data of the story. Class is serializable to load already downloaded stories to list 'downloadedStories' when the app starts.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Story

        public Story(Integer id,
     String title,
     String description,
     String author,
     String size,
     String size_uom,
     String location,
     String radius,
     String radius_uom,
     String created_at,
     String updated_at,
     boolean alreadyDownloaded)
        Constructor of the class 'Story'. A story can only be created when the following attributes are given.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the story, must be unique (meta data)
        title - title of the story (meta data)
        description - description of the story (meta data)
        author - author of the story (meta data)
        size - size of the story in MB (meta data)
        creation_date - creation date of the story (meta data)
        location - location in GPS coordinates (meta data)
        radius - radius in km (meta data)
